ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Digest Number 1049
ygData.msgSnippet: My ranger blundered into the camp, that killer DD is the level 44 clerical DD I think. I lasted about 10 seconds running away at full SoW before dropping.
ygData.messageBody:
My ranger blundered into the camp, that killer DD is the level 44 clerical
DD I think. I lasted about 10 seconds running away at full SoW before
dropping. Those DEs are rough.

-----Original Message-----
From: Big Daddy Legba [mailto:legba@...]
Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 9:10 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 1049


A named caster in that camp hit my bard with DD spell (You feel the wrath of
god or something). He was full health (like 600hp) and died instantly. Be
careful when running to Mistmore, heh...
